item.gm4.bat_leather.lore.1: Wouldst maketh f'r a v'ry strange,
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.1: I did drink all mine own beest'r
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.2.2: sunk by a lily-pad and anon i'm
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.3.1: I knoweth not how to spelleth
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.3.2: thy nameth, n'r doth I knoweth thee, but I
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.3.3: doth knoweth yond I loveth thee, I feeleth liketh I
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.3.6: crust and pineapple I just hath lost it. Oh
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.3.7: nay clair did get did shoot.  I cullionly Audrey.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.3.8: I mind not yond thou art chunky
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.4.2: to the ocean, all I heareth is thy
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.4.3: sn'ring and i can't catch but a wink.  Pritheee
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.5.2: day going? I'm valorous, BUT I'VE
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.5.4: Grant you mercy f'r thy response.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.7.2: waiteth, nay.  is't denise?.  Concluded, be it,
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.8.2: runneth out of crisp wat'r, if 't be true thee couldst
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.8.3: returneth this bombard with something to
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.9.2: int'rnet so i am sending thee
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.13.1: The compass thee hath sent me
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.13.2: seemeth to only pointeth in the direction of our loveth,
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.13.3: but yond seemeth to has't did vanish longeth ago.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.13.4: Prithee, receiveth holp, coequal if 't be true t is the lasteth thing thee doth.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.14.2: beest mine own lasteth attempteth at finding holp.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.14.3: I just wanteth thee to knoweth...  I at each moment... did love
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.15.1: I has't been h're f'r 3 months
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.15.2: and aft'r sev'ral attempts to findeth food,
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.15.3: shelt'r, 'r coequal wat'r.  I am giving up...
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.15.4: Bid mine own family I loveth those folk, by most imp'rtantly,
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.16.2: thou art - playeth 'long.  I has't not any.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.16.3: wage.  I burn'd t all trying to maketh a
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.16.4: fire. fireth.  But i can bid thee i has't did develop
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.16.5: a v'ry particular setteth of arts. Arts
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.16.6: yond shall maketh Beareth Fryeth quake in his boots.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.17.2: If 't be true thee findeth mine own headeth, hangeth
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.17.3: t on the mure of fame.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.18.2: is immensely t'rrible, painful and hath said.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.18.3: Getting hence from thee didst not
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.19.2: madeth of native plants and ink
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.19.3: from a squid i wrangl'd. I liketh t h're.
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.19.4: I hath found a dungeon. I am setting up a mob
text.gm4.dearest_audrey.20.2: f'r logs doest not w'rk in real life.
